author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Volitionrx Limited Announces Interim Results From 680-Subject Clinical Trial In Colorectal Cancer
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Volitionrx Ltd:
* VOLITIONRX LIMITED ANNOUNCES INTERIM RESULTS FROM 680-SUBJECT CLINICAL TRIAL IN COLORECTAL CANCER
* VOLITIONRX - ‍STUDY DEMONSTRATES HIGH DETECTION RATES OF STAGE I CANCER,PRE-CANCEROUS ADENOMAS IN COLORECTAL CANCER SCREENING TRIAL FOR NU.Q BLOOD TEST​
* VOLITIONRX LTD - ‍DATA IS EXPECTED FROM 680-SUBJECT CLINICAL TRIAL IN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
